mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO PET_INFO ( USER_NO, PET_NAME, PET_GENDER, PET_KIND, PET_BIRTHDAY, PET_WEIGHT, PET_NEUTRALIZATION, PET_MEETANOTHERPET, PET_BARKS, PET_BOWELTRAINING, PET_COMPREHENSIVE_VACCINE, PET_RABIESVACCINATION, PET_HEARTWORM, PET_CORONAENTERITIS, PET_KENNELKOV, PET_NONEVACCINE, PET_UNFAMILIAR, PET_SPECIALMATTERS, PET_REFERENCE, REG_NO, REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{userNo}, #{petName}, #{petGender}, #{petKind}, #{petBirthday}, #{petWeight}, #{petNeutralization}, #{petMeetAnotherPet}, #{petBarks}, #{petBowelTraining}, #{petComprehensiveVaccine}, #{petRabiesvaccination}, #{petHeartworm}, #{petCoronaenteritis}, #{petKennelkov}, #{petNonevaccine}, #{petUnfamiliar}, #{petSpecialMatters}, #{petReference}, #{userNo}, NOW() )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID();

INSERT INTO PET_FILE_INFO ( PET_NO, USER_NO, PET_FILE_ORG_NAME, PET_FILE_NAME, PET_FILE_PATH, REG_NO, REG_DT ) VALUE
( #{item.petNo}, #{item.userNo}, #{item.petFileOrgName}, #{item.petFileName}, #{item.petFilePath}, #{item.regNo}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT PET_INFO.PET_NO AS petNo, PET_INFO.PET_NAME AS petName, PET_INFO.PET_GENDER AS petGender, PET_INFO.PET_KIND AS petKind, (YEAR(CURDATE()) - YEAR(PET_INFO.PET_BIRTHDAY)) + 1 AS age, PET_FILE_INFO.PET_FILE_NAME AS petFileName FROM PET_INFO INNER JOIN PET_FILE_INFO ON PET_INFO.PET_NO = PET_FILE_INFO.PET_NO WHERE PET_INFO.USER_NO = #{userNo} GROUP BY PET_INFO.PET_NO;

SELECT PET_NO AS petNo, USER_NO AS userNo, PET_NAME AS petName, PET_GENDER AS petGender, PET_KIND AS petKind, PET_WEIGHT AS petWeight, PET_NEUTRALIZATION AS petNeutralization, PET_MEETANOTHERPET AS petMeetAnotherpet, PET_BARKS AS petBarks, PET_BOWELTRAINING AS petBoweltraining, PET_COMPREHENSIVE_VACCINE AS petComprehensiveVaccine, PET_RABIESVACCINATION AS petRabiesvaccination, PET_HEARTWORM AS petHeartworm, PET_CORONAENTERITIS AS petCoronaenteritis, PET_KENNELKOV AS petKennelkov, PET_NONEVACCINE AS petNonevaccine, REG_NO AS regNo, REG_DT AS regDt, CHG_NO AS chgNo, CHG_DT AS chgDt, PET_UNFAMILIAR AS petUnfamiliar, PET_SPECIALMATTERS AS petSpecialmatters, PET_REFERENCE AS petReference, PET_BIRTHDAY AS petBirthday FROM PET_INFO WHERE PET_NO = #{petNo} and user_no=#{userNo}

SELECT PET_FILE_NO AS petFileNo, PET_NO AS petNo, PET_FILE_ORG_NAME AS petFileOrgName, PET_FILE_NAME AS petFileName, PET_FILE_PATH AS petFilePath, REG_NO AS regNo, REG_DT AS regDt, CHG_NO AS chgNo, CHG_DT AS chgDt, USER_NO AS userNo FROM PET_FILE_INFO WHERE PET_NO = #{petNo} and USER_NO=#{userNo}
